amendment.description: Strike all after the enacting clause and insert the following: SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE. This Act may be cited as the `Puerto Rico Plebiscite Act of 2010' ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-468 to state that Puerto Rico has, and has had, the authority to conduct plebiscites.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Hastings (WA) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A008) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
